comments.body: For API review: this field is in beta status in the v1 API. This was discussed at SIG node meeting and was OK'd. There is no way to add lifecycle comments to the individual field, it is package-wide setting. So there is no indication on API (except the comment) that this is not a stable field.

If the field itself is beta, it should have its own gate, shouldn't it? It would need to be in dropDisabledFields() and it's behavior disableable.

Also the comment should be cleaned up
Thank you! I have updated a comment. Fields is disabled here: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/95718/files#diff-40853a2fe474b6bde454934dc4e0742a3d9bbf98c31336d8d74520ebe8a2e300L418-L420
